pattern with the red color chain 61 row1 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from the hook single_crochet in every chain row2 introducing the black color join the color through the last worked st ch1 turn single_crochet in the 1st st with the black put it aside continue single_crochet with the red color till the last st where you ll introduce the green color in the last st work the last single_crochet with the green row 3 still with the green color ch1 single_crochet in the 1st and 2nd st put it aside continue with the red color in the last red st before the black make a single_crochet with the black and continue to the last st 2 black sts turn row 4 still with the black ch1 single_crochet in the next 3 sts with red continue single_crochet in every red st in the last red st before the green reintroduce the green color single_crochet in the next sts till the end turn continue repeating row 4 till there is row 21 where you ll introduce the white color after the last black st the same way we did with the previous colors and before the green of the same row continue following the color chart until the red is finished and you are left only with 3 colors
